cause.description:
Subject: Our Palestinian Kids…
Childhood should be filled with happiness… Full of fun and playful memories… Both rich and poor children should have these…
But not our Palestinian kids… The main reason stopping them? Israel…
Because of them, our kids play with bullets, while their kids play with toys…
Their kids watch cartoons in the comfort of their home, while our kids watch the news under the terrifying battles on their grounds…
Their kids were born smiling, while our kids didn’t even learn how to smile…
Their kids eat chicken from KFC and burgers from McDonalds, while our kids look around just for bread…
Israel has done so much damage to our kids and what their childhood could have been, and we watch and don't do much…
Please help us in trying to give them at least a little comfort of what we have, fill their memories with a little fun and enjoyment…
